title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\Job
name: Job
description:
A Dataproc job resource.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.Job

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.reference
params.description: Optional. The fully qualified reference to the job, which can be used to obtain the equivalent REST path of the job resource. If this property is not specified when a job is created, the server generates a job_id.

params.name: data.placement
params.description: Required. Job information, including how, when, and where to run the job.

params.name: data.status
params.description: Output only. The job status. Additional application-specific status information may be contained in the type_job and yarn_applications fields.

params.name: data.yarn_applications
params.description: Output only. The collection of YARN applications spun up by this job. Beta Feature: This report is available for testing purposes only. It may be changed before final release.

params.name: data.driver_output_resource_uri
params.description: Output only. A URI pointing to the location of the stdout of the job's driver program.

params.name: data.driver_control_files_uri
params.description: Output only. If present, the location of miscellaneous control files which may be used as part of job setup and handling. If not present, control files may be placed in the same location as driver_output_uri.

params.name: data.labels
params.description: Optional. The labels to associate with this job. Label keys must contain 1 to 63 characters, and must conform to RFC 1035. Label values may be empty, but, if present, must contain 1 to 63 characters, and must conform to RFC 1035. No more than 32 labels can be associated with a job.

params.name: data.job_uuid
params.description: Output only. A UUID that uniquely identifies a job within the project over time. This is in contrast to a user-settable reference.job_id that may be reused over time.

params.name: data.done
params.description: Output only. Indicates whether the job is completed. If the value is false, the job is still in progress. If true, the job is completed, and status.state field will indicate if it was successful, failed, or cancelled.

methods.name: getLabels
methods.description:
Optional. The labels to associate with this job.

Label keys must contain 1 to 63 characters, and must conform to RFC 1035. Label values may be empty, but, if present, must contain 1 to 63 characters, and must conform to RFC 1035. No more than 32 labels can be associated with a job.
